title: Did Not Receive The Captain Gangplank Skin
body: (Talking to the person who distributed the Captain GP skin) I had Gangplank like a long time ago already, even before this event of the Bilgewater. And after the event was over, I never received the Captain GP skin at all, even as it's selling for 975 when I was suppose to receive the skin for free, since the requirement says to own GP before the event was over. Please gift me the skin please.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

As others have mentioned the following criteria was needed to earn the free Captain Gangplank skin -

- Own Gangplank before the event ended on August 10th.
- Play one match made game with Gangplank (co-op v ai counts, but not customs) before the event ended on August 10th.

We're still in the process of distributing rewards for the event. If once we've stated all rewards have been handed out [(check the ticker at the top here for updates)](https://support.riotgames.com) and you don't have one, but you believe you've met the criteria, please submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I guess i forgot to play GP before the end of the event, so I guess i won't be able to receive it then, I totally forgot to play him, since i was playing GP on my smurf account and totally forgot to play him on my main lol, ok the case is clear then thank for the heads up.

they also said it would take a few days to hand everything out like it always does, just wait a couple days and if you still dont get it(assuming you *did* meet the requirments) bring it back up or send in a ticket
You need to own him and played a matchmade game with him...**_during the event._**
Own *and play a matchmade game as* Gangplank. Did you play a game as him?
